{
    "name": "acl1_tcp",
    "interfaces": {
        "egress": [
            ""
        ],
        "ingress": [
            ""
        ]
    },
    "rules": [
        {
            "action": 2,
            "ip_rule": {
                "ip": {
                    "destination_network": "10.0.0.0/32",
                    "source_network": "10.0.0.0/32"
                },
                "tcp": {
                    "destination_port_range": {
                        "lower_port": 80,
                        "upper_port": 1000
                    },
                    "source_port_range": {
                        "lower_port": 10,
                        "upper_port": 2000
                    },
                    "tcp_flags_mask": 20,
                    "tcp_flags_value": 10
                }
            }
        }
    ]
}
